{{cpp/title|time_t}}
{{cpp/chrono/c/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=ctime|1=
typedef /* unspecified */ time_t;
}}
Arithmetic type capable of representing times.

Although not defined, this is almost always an integral value holding the number of seconds (not counting leap seconds) since 00:00, Jan 1 1970 UTC, corresponding to [[enwiki:Unix_time|POSIX time]].
